title: Extract District Facts
context: Extracts factual information about a district from source documents and produces a structured work product with provenance tracking.

output_work_product_contract.description: Structured work product with verified facts

stop_rules.condition: Source document is unreadable or corrupted
stop_rules.reason: Cannot extract facts from invalid input

stop_rules.condition: Numeric fact has no source citation

human_review_gate.description: A human reviewer must verify extracted facts before publishing
required_actions: Confirm numeric values match source documents
optional_actions: Add additional context in notes field

metric.name: Fact Accuracy Rate
metric.definition: Percentage of extracted facts that match source documents on manual audit

non_claims: Does not guarantee real-time accuracy after extraction
Does not automatically update when sources change
Does not validate compliance with local regulations
Does not replace official government sources
